conversations.conversation: Hello one and all. I am hoping to find more people interested in serving GOD. I am an ordained minister and am trying to get a ministry in the web ministry field started. Anyone who is interested please feel free to contact me and let me know. Anyone seeking prayer, or just a kind word is always welcome to contact me. I will not turn anyone away for prayer or just a word from GOD. All I ask is that you treat me with the same respect I will treat you with.
